verses.verse: Thinkest <WH2803> thou this <WH2063> to be right, <WH4941> that thou saidst, <WH559> My righteousness <WH6664> is more than God's? <WH4480> <WH410>
For <WH3588> thou saidst, <WH559> What <WH4100> advantage <WH5532> will it be unto thee? and, What <WH4100> profit <WH3276> shall I have, if I be cleansed from my sin? <WH4480> <WH2403>
I <WH589> will answer <WH7725> <WH4405> thee, and thy companions <WH7453> with <WH5973> thee.
Look <WH5027> unto the heavens, <WH8064> and see; <WH7200> and behold <WH7789> the clouds <WH7834> which are higher <WH1361> than <WH4480> thou.
If <WH518> thou sinnest, <WH2398> what <WH4100> doest <WH6466> thou against him? or if thy transgressions <WH6588> be multiplied, <WH7231> what <WH4100> doest <WH6213> thou unto him?
If <WH518> thou be righteous, <WH6663> what <WH4100> givest <WH5414> thou him? or <WH176> what <WH4100> receiveth <WH3947> he of thine hand? <WH4480> <WH3027>
Thy wickedness <WH7562> may hurt a man <WH376> as thou <WH3644> art; and thy righteousness <WH6666> may profit the son <WH1121> of man. <WH120>
By reason of the multitude <WH4480> <WH7230> of oppressions <WH6217> they make the oppressed to cry: <WH2199> they cry out <WH7768> by reason of the arm <WH4480> <WH2220> of the mighty. <WH7227>
But none <WH3808> saith, <WH559> Where <WH346> is God <WH433> my maker, <WH6213> who giveth <WH5414> songs <WH2158> in the night; <WH3915>
Who teacheth <WH502> us more than the beasts <WH4480> <WH929> of the earth, <WH776> and maketh us wiser <WH2449> than the fowls <WH4480> <WH5775> of heaven? <WH8064>
There <WH8033> they cry, <WH6817> but none <WH3808> giveth answer, <WH6030> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of the pride <WH1347> of evil men. <WH7451>
Surely <WH389> God <WH410> will not <WH3808> hear <WH8085> vanity, <WH7723> neither <WH3808> will the Almighty <WH7706> regard <WH7789> it.
Although <WH637> <WH3588> thou sayest <WH559> thou shalt not <WH3808> see <WH7789> him, yet judgment <WH1779> is before <WH6440> him; therefore trust <WH2342> thou in him.
But now, <WH6258> because <WH3588> it is not <WH369> so, he hath visited <WH6485> in his anger; <WH639> yet he knoweth <WH3045> it not <WH3808> in great <WH3966> extremity: <WH6580>
Therefore doth Job <WH347> open <WH6475> his mouth <WH6310> in vain; <WH1892> he multiplieth <WH3527> words <WH4405> without <WH1097> knowledge. <WH1847>
